title: 93/525/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 September 1993 amending Decision 93/437/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Argentina
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 29 September 1993 amending Decision 93/437/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Argentina
(93/525/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B to Decision 93/437/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 September 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 202, 12. 8. 1993, p. 42.
(3) OJ No L 8, 11. 1. 1990, p. 70.
